did.unittitle: U.S. Missile Sites Labor Commission Records, 1961-1965
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Press releases and decisions of the United States President's Missile Sites Labor Commission

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of press releases and decisions of the United States President's Missile Sites Labor Commission. Spanning the years 1961 to 1965, this collection is arranged chronologically.

controlaccess.corpname: United States. Missile Sites Labor Commission.

controlaccess.subject: Strikes and lockouts--Missile and space industry.
Strikes and lockouts--Guided missile industries--United States.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: U.S. Missile Sites Labor Commission Records #5385. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
